text_block_list.text:
Oh, perfect timing! 
Look at this movie trailer!
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Epic, right? It gives me the thrills! 
And the director said the stunts are done 
without CG!
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Wanna know the best part? 
Your favorite actor's in it as well!
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Hehe, let's check it out when it's 
released. At a premiere, of course!
text_block_list.name: Transcend
